title: [Bad]  Uber reserves the right to establish, remove and/or revise Charges

tosdr.tldr: [Bad]  Uber reserves the right to establish, remove and/or revise Charges for any or all services or goods obtained through the use of their Services at any time at their sole discretion.  Charges applicable in certain geographical areas may increase substantially during times of high demand and you are responsible for Charges incurred under your Account regardless of your awareness of such Charges or the amounts.
